title: where can i get /snapshot/checkpoint_e9.pth?
body:
[2019-07-24 10:17:53,928-rk0-load_helper.py# 58] restore from snapshot/checkpoint_e9.pth
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ai/PycharmProjects/SiamMask/experiments/siammask_base/tools/train_siammask.py", line 292, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/ai/PycharmProjects/SiamMask/experiments/siammask_base/tools/train_siammask.py", line 161, in main
    model, optimizer, args.start_epoch, best_acc, arch = restore_from(model, optimizer, args.resume)
  File "/home/ai/PycharmProjects/SiamMask/experiments/siammask_base/utils/load_helper.py", line 60, in restore_from
    ckpt = torch.load(ckpt_path, map_location=lambda storage, loc: storage.cuda(device))
  File "/home/ai/anaconda3/envs/siammask/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 358, in load
    return _load(f, map_location, pickle_module)
  File "/home/ai/anaconda3/envs/siammask/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 532, in _load
    magic_number = pickle_module.load(f)
EOFError: Ran out of input

hi! when I wanna run the run.sh(in cd $SiamMask/experiments/siammask_base/). I met an error.The program said that it need restore /snapshot/checkpoint_e9.pth.But there have no this document.I just thought it should be to build up in this program(weight). and i can get this document from your project.could u help me?thank u very much!
